alert.note: Alert for Lower Terrebonne; St. Charles; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 2:43PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central St. Charles, north central Terrebonne and northwestern Lafourche Parishes through 330 PM CDT... At 243 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mathews to 6 miles southwest of Gray. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 30 to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Houma, Thibodaux, Hahnville, Lockport, Mathews, Schriever, Paradis, Gray, Des Allemands, Raceland, Bayou Cane, Boutte, Bayou Gauche and Luling. This includes Interstate 310 between mile markers 9 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lower Terrebonne; St. Charles; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne
